Word.Root: To be productive, generous, precious, valuable, honorable, noble, All-Generous, Most Generous

Meaning.Definition: كَرُمَ aor. يَكْرُمُ inf. noun كَرَمٌ : He or it was or became highly esteemed or valuedكَرَمْتُ عَلَيْهِ : I exceeded him in generosity or nobleness.كَرَّمَهٗ اَوْ اَكْرَمَهٗ :He honored him. اَكْرَمُ : More and most honored (most generous).
Meaning.Example: Token(17:71:1:4): Indeed We have honored the children of Adam (17:71).
Token(89:16:7:8): Honors him and bestows favors upon him (89:16).
Token(82:7:5:6) Thy Gracious Lord (82:7) كِرَامٌ (plural of كَرِيْمٌ ).
